languages.text: "Вы потеряли свой мир, а теперь ради мести лишаете мира других. Чем же вы лучше?"

traits.locale_text: "Вы потеряли свой мир, а теперь ради мести лишаете мира других. Чем же вы лучше?"

languages.text: "You lost your world and are now depriving others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"
languages.original_text: "Вы потеряли свой мир, а теперь ради мести лишаете мира других. Чем же вы лучше?"

traits.locale_text: "You lost your own world and are now depriving the others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"
"You lost your own world and are now depriving the others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"
"You lost your world and are now depriving the others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"
"You lost your world and are now depriving the others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"
"You lost your world and are now depriving others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"
"You lost your world and are now depriving others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"

languages.text: «Perdisteis vuestro mundo y ahora priváis a otros del suyo por venganza. ¿Por qué os creéis distintos?».
languages.original_text: "You lost your world and are now depriving others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"

traits.locale_text: «Perdisteis vuestro mundo y ahora priváis a otros del suyo por venganza. ¿Por qué os creéis distintos?».

languages.text: “你失去了你自己的世界，现在又以复仇的名义夺走别人的世界。你凭什么认为你和那个血伶人不一样？”
languages.original_text: "You lost your world and are now depriving others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"

traits.locale_text: “你失去了你自己的世界，现在又以复仇的名义夺走别人的世界。你凭什么认为你和那个血伶人不一样？”

languages.text: « Vous avez perdu votre monde et maintenant, vous privez d'autres du leur par pur esprit de vengeance. En quoi vous croyez-vous si différents ? »
languages.original_text: "You lost your world and are now depriving others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez perdu votre monde et maintenant, vous privez d'autres du leur par pur esprit de vengeance. En quoi vous croyez-vous si différents ? »

languages.text: 「お前は自分の世界を失い、復讐のために他の人々の世界を奪っている。なぜ自分は違うと思うのか？」
languages.original_text: "You lost your world and are now depriving others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は自分の世界を失い、復讐のために他の人々の世界を奪っている。なぜ自分は違うと思うのか？」

languages.text: "Ihr habt Eure Welt verloren und beraubt die anderen jetzt aus Rache der ihren. Warum glaubt Ihr, anders zu sein?"
languages.original_text: "You lost your world and are now depriving others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Eure Welt verloren und beraubt die anderen jetzt aus Rache der ihren. Warum glaubt Ihr, anders zu sein?"

languages.text: "Dünyanızı kaybettiniz, şimdi de intikam uğruna diğerlerini dünyalarından mahrum ediyorsunuz. Kendinizi neden farklı görüyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: "You lost your world and are now depriving others of theirs out of vengeance. Why do you think you are different?"

traits.locale_text: "Dünyanızı kaybettiniz, şimdi de intikam uğruna diğerlerini dünyalarından mahrum ediyorsunuz. Kendinizi neden farklı görüyorsunuz?"
